sentences.sentence: They use dead elm saplings from nearby woods as stakes, start most of their plants from seeds in reusable pots and trade seedlings with other gardeners.
sentences.translation: 他们用附近树林里死去的榆树树苗作为树桩，用可重复使用的花盆里的种子种植大部分榆树，并与其他园丁交换树苗。

sentences.sentence: The saplings should be two metres apart.
We will have to redouble our loving care of the saplings that have just been planted.
sentences.translation: 对刚栽下的小树，我们要倍加爱护。
